definition: (E)-Phenylacetaldoxime + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Glutathione + Oxygen <=> S-[(Z)-N-Hydroxy(phenyl)acetimidoyl]-L-glutathione + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
name: (E)-phenylacetaldehyde oxime,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase],glutathione:oxygen oxidoreductase (oxime-hydroxylating)
